title: La Cabaña Argentina
address: Calle de Ventura de la Vega, 9-10, Barrio de las Letras
knownFor: Best Argentinian restaurant in Madrid, quality meat cuts
description: Premier Argentinian steakhouse in Madrid's literary quarter, near Plaza de las Cortes. Known for exceptional quality and variety of meat cuts. Rustic exposed-brick walls create authentic South American atmosphere. Reasonable prices for the quality offered.
